title: r/Prorevenge Punch Me In The Face? I'll Sue You For $80,000! ðŸ¤‘
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP has a fender bender with an angry person who decides to punch OP in the face. OP decides to get revenge and sues the road rager in court. Let's just say that the court case goes very, very badly for the puncher, because the judge awards OP an $80,000 judgment! Not only does OP bankrupt this douchebag, the court case also gets the guy fired from his job! Oops!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
